device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
devices_included: Any screen device; Phone; Tablet; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Whiteboard, large vertical display; Laptop; Desktop computer
use_cases_desc: Demo around perspective-aware interfaces in multi-device environments. Projection of maps, but application is generic.
contribution_desc: Emerging technologies demo, about perspective-aware interfaces and multi-device environments.
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Location 3D; Orientation; Identity; Tracking users and devices
interaction_techniques: Input methods, but not further described
